attributes.additional_details:
I feel that tax on sanitary products should be abolished. I feel it is grossly unfair that women have to pay for what their body does naturally and what we have no control over.
On average women are paying at least £5 per month on products that should be given free as they are essential items for the health and sanitation of our country.
Women are being taken advantage of financially and its time it stopped. I propose a ban on taxation of sanitary products.
